'''Kaali''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Son of [Tatok](/tatok/), Kalli is one of the recent tributes delivered to Nemnok, currently engaged in a ritual to summon the mighty god into the world. Like other acolytes at the Barrows, he is completely devoted to Nemnok, believing him to be the greatest god of Eora.

## Interactions

|stronghold      =
|rest            =

|quests_involved = [Nemnok the Devourer](/nemnokTheDevourerQuest/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Nemnok the Devourer](/nemnokTheDevourerQuest/): Kaali is the objective of the quest.

==Background==
